Hi... I was wondering if anyone here's watching the weekly Historical 
dram=
as of NHK.  I've been watching them since my college days starting 
with th=
 "Aoi" series.  Just a question, how accurate are they?  I've 
been mostly =
intrigued with the "Toshiie to Matsu" series back in 2002, 
and I'm wonderi=
ng if Hideyoshi and Toshiie were really that connected 
as protrayed in the=
 series.  (Obviously I'm a fan of the Sengoku Jidai)
Thanks...
